trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供設計階段支援<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: EditorZoneDesigner provides design-time rendering of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> controls.
trans-unit.target: EditorZoneDesigner 提供設計階段呈現<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: It includes support for editable designer regions, templates, and auto-formats to allow a page developer to easily alter the appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 其中包括可編輯的設計工具區域、 範本及自動格式設定可讓網頁開發人員輕鬆地變更控制項的外觀的支援。

trans-unit.source: The public <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collections provide quick formatting options for the page developer and can be safely overridden to change the default appearance of a custom control.
trans-unit.target: 公用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>集合提供快速的網頁開發人員的格式化選項，就可以安全地覆寫變更為自訂控制項的預設外觀。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneDesigner"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 取得之預先定義的自動格式化配置集合中顯示**自動格式化**在設計階段的相關聯控制項的對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: The AutoFormats property overrides its base implementation to return a collection for use with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> controls.
trans-unit.target: 自動格式設定屬性覆寫以傳回集合搭配使用其基底實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: A pre-specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> with a default EditorZone scheme.
trans-unit.target: 預先指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref>與預設 EditorZone 配置。

trans-unit.source: Invokes <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName> with a null parameter.
trans-unit.target: 叫用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>與 null 的參數。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the markup of the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>表示在設計階段控制項的標記。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來代表控制項設計階段的標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref>, if any, associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"> </xref>，如果有與控制項相關聯。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the markup of the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>表示在設計階段控制項的標記。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the content for the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定內容<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the persisted form of the designer region's content.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>表示之永久的格式的設計工具區域的內容。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup to represent an empty control.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示空控制項的標記。

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 空白<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Binds the designer to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 將設計工具繫結至相關聯<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone"></xref> control associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone"> </xref>設計工具關聯的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Sets the content of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定的內容<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the content to go in the specified region.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，代表要在指定的區域的內容。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of template groups, each containing one or more template definitions.
trans-unit.target: 取得範本群組集合各包含一個或多個範本定義。

trans-unit.source: The TemplateGroups property overrides its base implementation to return a collection for use with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> controls.
trans-unit.target: TemplateGroups 屬性會覆寫以傳回集合搭配使用其基底實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: A pre-specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"></xref> with default settings for an EditorZone environment.
trans-unit.target: 預先指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"> </xref> EditorZone 環境的預設設定。
